snippet: At least 27 people have been killed in the storms that struck last Friday or their aftermath, including deaths from heat-related causes.
abstract: Hundreds of thousands of people remain without power in the Mid-Atlantic states nearly a week after a series of deadly storms struck the region.
lead_paragraph: At least 27 people have been killed in the storms that struck last Friday or their aftermath, including deaths from heat-related causes.

headline.main: Power Still Off for Hundreds of Thousands
headline.print_headline: Power Still Off For Hundreds of Thousands
